meaningMnemonic: If you only let <radical>oneself</radical> (yourself) into your <radical>heart</radical>, you'll end up <kanji>mourning</kanji> all of the loves and friendships you could have had but didn't let in.
readingMnemonic: While you're in <kanji>mourning</kanji>, you feel a sharp pain in your crying eyes. A <reading>key</reading> (き) comes sliding out with your tears. You look around wildly, but you're still alone. Is this... the key of mourning?
